page.title: 16GUITING POWER.LIGHT INDUSTRY
page.content: In Guiting Power there is a light- engineering business.They work with metal,designing,making and repairing. Just now, they are making railings, barbecues and an aircraft crash tender for overseas. They use drills,lathes, welding-irons,milling machines,saws and guillotines which run on petrol, diesel,paraffin or electricity. Supplies come from Cheltenham, Gloucester or Birmingham.All the machines together use only as much fuel as an ordinary house. The business is 5 years old.There are 3-4 workers.Most of the customers are farmers,builders,quarries and fire-engine companies and they learn of the business by word of mouth, as advertising is very expensive.
